website_summaries.verdict: Although it comes with some durability concerns, it's worth considering if you are looking for a leather briefcase by a trusted manufacturer for a reasonable price.
pros: A good-looking briefcase in black that pairs nicely with business attire
Shoulder strap is padded and removable
Expands to accommodate a laptop, files, and more
Made by a top name in the luggage industry and available at a mid-level price
cons: Leather isn't the best quality, and tends to show wear on the edges and handles
Zippers are prone to jamming or breaking

customer_reviews.title: False advertisment
customer_reviews.text: Case advertised as leather, but after two month of use corners started to peal of and guess what? It is not a leather. This is deceiving advertisement. Too bad I did not pay attention and just trusted seller. If I could give zero points , I would!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Let me start by saying I am always very gentle with my laptop bags. However, the ribbing around edges of this bag degrades with contact with other surfaces. Quickly wears away to expose the gray material under the black skin of the ribbing at the corners of the bag. One of the shoulder strap fasteners that attach to the bag broke in half while I was carrying it over the shoulder, resulting in my laptop bag falling to the ground from my side while I was walking. Very poor quality. I am done with Samsonite products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Funny Smell...PU Leather?
customer_reviews.text: This is very roomy and many pockets and hidden zipper compartments. However, the real reason I bought this was because it said it was genuine leather (I love the smell of leather), but it doesn't smell like real leather. It has a chemical smell to it. So this tells me they are misrepresenting this, and it's really a PU leather. I will probably return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Allen!

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product! I was looking for a while for a briefcase for work. Something that looks nice and is durable. Something that doesn’t really show scratches or marks. This was perfect and really awesome value for the money. I love the compartments. Easy to separate files. Nice compartment for a 15 inch laptop. It looks really nice too. It does not look cheap at all. Leather is great and stitching doesn’t show. Looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: MALAM

customer_reviews.title: didnt fit my 17" dell G3 laptop
customer_reviews.text: My new 17" laptop didn't fit... it barely fit width wise but stuck out the top and couldn't be ziped closed. Now I have to pay $8 in shipping to return it. In the Q&A is says "Yes" to fitting 17" laptops... I'm calling BS on this one... the quality was nice but the GD bag was just too small for my laptop, which is a pretty minimal design for being a 17". Disappointed in the on-line description, however the product was actually quite nice for the price. Just ticks me off I have to pay and go through the hassle of shipping this...
customer_reviews.author: Amazing customer

customer_reviews.title: From a lawyer's perspective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a present for a young attorney who was recently called to the bar. It looks classy and well built. The attorney who I bought it for loves it. It's also convenient to move around with, for e.g. when travelling in a taxi. However, I would not recommend it as the only briefcase for a lawyer since it is simply not large enough to carry around large books and files. For a primary briefcase, I recommend and use a pilot case. As a travel briefcase or secondary briefcase though, it seems like a solid choice .
customer_reviews.author: Davindra

customer_reviews.title: A very professional executive briefcase
customer_reviews.text: I use this briefcase every day I go to work. I love all the compartments, the bag is very comfortable, durable, and professional looking. My last Samsonite bag lasted 12 years, and believe me, I put it through a lot. Because of this bag I purchased Samsonite luggage 5 years ago and have had the same positive results. I am very happy with Samsonite, I have always gotten my money's worth. Zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Love This Bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect portfolio bag to carry papers, pens, a laptop, and incidentals. It even has a pocket one one side through which a roll-aboard bag handle can fit through so that it can safely rest on top of the roll-aboard bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joe P

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Lots of compartments and appears very well made.While it can easily hold a 15 inch laptop. The extra weight may create excessive wear and tear on the device. In my view it is most suitable for smaller devices. eg. surface pro, 10" tablet with keyboard etc. This is an executive briefcase case which is fully functional
customer_reviews.author: AaronG

customer_reviews.title: The product being used for less than a year of use shows a deterioration more than normal
customer_reviews.text: The product has an exaggerated wear. I fear that this wear would increase if I don't make the claim ... I'm worried because this suitcase should last more than 3 years. I just sent a claim to Samsonite, Still waiting their answer, because the product is still in guarantie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the busy person who has lots to carry
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather briefcase. Bought for an early Christmas gift and it works perfectly. Love how many pockets are available for everything that my husband needs. He carries a lot in his briefcase and it does not show any wear after a couple months, as well as it fully holds what he needs. We love that it has a sleeve to attach to his suitcase for his business trips. Glad I chose this briefcase!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the original
customer_reviews.text: My first one of these lasted about 6 years and more than a million air miles. This one seems to be made of thinner materials and is already showing damage after a few months. I really miss the little outside pocket that held my passport and boarding pass. First one gets five stars, this version only 3.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: All Black makes it stealth (my last bag had silver zippers and logo and I had liked that better but now I like this one better). Can handle weight. It’s Samsonite quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but not a lot of capacity
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking briefcase and appears that it will hold up well. Zippers are sturdy and it has a classic design. The biggest drawback is that its sturdiness makes it so stiff that it's hard to fit much into it. I have a 15" laptop that just makes it, but it's a tight squeeze for the charger and the 3-4 other small chargers I need to carry. The portfolio side is also tight, a thin padfolio and maybe 3-4 pretty thin files is all it holds. Maybe it's just taking awhile to break in, but I may end looking to another solution due to the lack of capacity.
customer_reviews.author: James Laabs

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic Zippers fall apart after a Year
customer_reviews.text: I figured Samsonite-good, Leather-good, $100-great. But after a year of daily commuting the zippers started breaking one-by-one. Those cheap plastic spiral-type zippers are not made to last, invest in a case with metal zippers. The leather is also extremely flimsy, glued over cloth and peels or tears at any stress points.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Classic, nicely designed case
customer_reviews.text: I like the classic design and roomy interior. There are plenty of zippered pockets for holding a laptop and tech accessories. I used this to carry my things to and from work. The shoulder strap is convenient when my hands are full. There is an expansion zipper too.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased for my son.
customer_reviews.text: My son is required to carry a lot of forms and paper work for his job. He doesn't like it because it has so many pockets he feels he wastes a lot of time hunting for things. This probably wouldn't be a problem for most people who may be more organized than he is.
customer_reviews.author: Marni

customer_reviews.title: Great All-Purpose business briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Excellent contemporary "soft" briefcase with well-structured compartments. Holds most laptops in a padded section, which can otherwise be used for files--or briefs. All other compartments are well-thought out, with holders for electronic devices, pens, markers and eyeglasses. Expansion zippered compartment has room for a windbreaker or folded sports jacket. Shoulder strap balances the briefcase across your back for long walks or that bicycle trip to the metro. I had vinyl versions of the same briefcase, not quite as well appointed, that lasted for 3 or 4 years of daily abuse. This one being leather, I hope it will survive even longer.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable & professional- you can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Durable sharp professional expanding briefcase. Stands up on its own, will not stand up under an aircraft seat but will fit on its side. For less than $100 it is a bargain, Lots of pockets and easy access
customer_reviews.author: Sick66

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This briefcase gave me mixed expectations when I read the reviews. I was worried about the quality of leather and the size, along with the durability. I've taken this thing everywhere, and I haven't had a problem. Out of the 5 briefcases I've owned (of $100-$400), this is by far my favorite. Very spacious, if needed. Leather is super nice and it is sleek. Everyone comments on how great it looks. It fits everything smoothly and has room for virtually and office supplies you'd need to put it in. Very happy with this and I recommend it! Con: only thing is that the strap for the computer never can be pulled very tight because the Velcro is too high.
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: Handle with care, cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Great storage capacity, love the layout and bags available. Hard to get the laptop in and out, but doable. Really poor quality that easily tears and rips, especially at the bottom. The "leather" is just plastic all around.
customer_reviews.author: Juan V.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this briefcase less than 3 months and the strap is already torn. Very Cheaply made- if you ask me. And no one has responded to correspondances.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D.

customer_reviews.title: Good brief case for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my last brief case was a Samsonite and it lasted for years. I have only had this one a few months but it is holding up. I use it every day so if there were any design flaws, it would become obvious soon.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for spouse’s Christmas gift and he loves it. “This is very professional” were his exact words.........The quality seems good will come after 3month and review it again. But he likes it we haven’t been to work as yet so he haven’t used it as yet.....s
customer_reviews.author: KayCee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Expandable Case
customer_reviews.text: This case if very well sized. It expands to hold a lot. Outside pockets. Great for laptop and files. Nice black exterior. So far it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: t
customer_reviews.text: I am using this product hold my 15.6'' TECRA seller claims it is 17'' but barely fits my 15.6'' PC it is not what was expected however I am stock with it cost $110.00 I believe these folks thinks shoppers is a joke want so much for certain product that do not stand out for the price their asking . I will not buy this again too small for the type of PC'S I own this is only for a 14'' size PC'S the seller claims it is 17'' maybe no one dose MATHS at their place of business charging for a product that is clearly miss quoted !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! .
customer_reviews.author: Ron4U

customer_reviews.title: Better than I had expected!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the earlier reviews, I wasn't sure what to expect from this briefcase. Although I have only used it since the end of May, I must say that I am delighted with how it has held up (thrown in and out of my car often) and how incredibly roomy it is. Whoever designed this has used every possible place for storage. Just the other day, I discovered yet another tiny compartment. Needless to say, I am very satisfied with this product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L. Harp

customer_reviews.title: Super great briefcase at a super great price.
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding product with every feature listed plus a lot more. I am very happy with this purchase. It has a hidden zipper that allows it to expand a full 2.5 inches. It is gorgeous and well made. The soft leather invites you to rub it and the all leather handles are as soft as the finest doctor's bag. I never imagined that anyone would produce such a fabulous briefcase at any price and for it to be a Samsonite too, makes it a truly unbelievable deal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my fiance as a Christmas gift. We really like it. It is good quality. It has a slot for a suitcase handle so it's great for travel as well as everyday use. It is rather large and has a LOT of compartments. If you tend to carry a lot of stuff in your briefcase this will work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jesi White

customer_reviews.title: The quality wasn’t all that great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Not the quality I expected from Samsonite! The leather didn’t feel real, too shiny! I had to return!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this bag. He works in real estate and often travels with this bag. It is sturdy and durable. And protects his computer as he takes it out of the bag at least 5 times /day. Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag. I enjoy carrying it with me. It is fashionable, durable, and very practical. My laptop fits perfectly inside. I also keep a few notebooks, pens, and several other items I need with me everyday. It handles them all easily and nothing moves around too much inside while traveling. I look forward to taking it with me when I fly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Swiontek

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bag but doesn’t fit most 17”
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag. It would have been my final purchase but it did not fit my 17” notebook.
customer_reviews.author: SweetGregorMendel

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: I use it for in home sales. Carries all my tools and papers with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: disappointed doll man

customer_reviews.title: Fantatic Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: This Samsonite Leather Expandable Briefcase (Black) was purchased as a gift for my son who is a musician and a music teacher. He is pretty particular and fell in love with it's great quality and expandability. He can use it for his music concert trips and music books, lesson plans and papers from his students. He is happy and so am I. Also, I did check quite a few places to cost compare, and Amazon was the least expensive. That is always a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was able to transfer everything from my old bag to this one. not sure how long the strap swivels will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Blakeslee

customer_reviews.title: My one caveat is that it is pretty heavy before you even put anything in it
customer_reviews.text: This leather briefcase is extremely well made - as you'd expect for a Samsonite! My one caveat is that it is pretty heavy before you even put anything in it! Once my husband puts his computer, charger, and a few other things in it, and it's nearly too heavy for my wrists if I move it for him!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase for men
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his new expandable briefcase and I do too.
customer_reviews.author: God's Child

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather, roomy, great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. It is nice and roomy and we both like it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who isn’t very gentle with his stuff. So far we’re coming up on a year of him having this and using it for work and business trips and it’s still in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and look
customer_reviews.text: Great for traveling. I travel business lightweight with just the Essenciais. It does the job. Great quality and look.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Muller

customer_reviews.title: Love My Bag
customer_reviews.text: Great Bag. Exactly what I needed. Lots of pockets and compartments for numerous items from papers, books to cords, pens, business cards, and lunch!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Bolognese

customer_reviews.title: ... of space for all your business needs and the best part is it sits and doesn't fall over like ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space for all your business needs and the best part is it sits and doesn't fall over like other briefcases I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Soukup

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase.
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my mother in law and she loves it. It has a ton of pockets and lots of space for organization and is very practical and functional. It looks nice as well. I personally don't like buying genuine leather products but the mother in law loved that.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Nice computer bag.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and I cram all sorts of stuff in this thing. It has lots of compartments and it really does hold a lot of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for some time now (about 6 months) and traveled with it both domestically and internationally. It seems to have held up pretty well so far (I do tend to be very careful with it though). I like the layout of the briefcase and the number of pockets has been perfect for me so far. The expandable section is nice, although it does make it very bulky. I wish the front pocket for pens and such were slightly deeper, but overall it is just about all that I wanted from it.
customer_reviews.author: Darmir

customer_reviews.title: Space and Organization Great, Looks OK
customer_reviews.text: Pros (according to my boyfriend, a lawyer who I gave this as a gift) - Plenty of space (this was the biggest briefcase I could find for him, since he kept saying he needed more room for legal files than any others we saw had) - Excellent Pockets for organization - Shiny Leather (if you like, my boyfriend does) Cons: - Boxy Appearance
customer_reviews.author: Jane Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Great size fits two laptops!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag but considered it won’t be able to deal with weekly travel
customer_reviews.author: Kishan M

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase. Get compliments all the time
customer_reviews.text: Great briefcase. Get compliments all the time. Have had it for three months and it’s held up very well. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: One year on and still going strong.....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my husband a year ago and he is still raving about it. It is very sturdy and holds all of his documents. All the stitching is still intact ( no small feat as in most other bags they soon come apart) Ever so often he just wipes it down with warm water to keep it looking sharp. You don't always get what you pay for but trust me it is worth EVERY penny....
customer_reviews.author: Marita P. Benskin

customer_reviews.title: It’s as adevertised
customer_reviews.text: Genuine leather and very spacious. More room than I expected. Pockets for up to 17 inch laptop, notebooks or padfolios. Additionally there are pockets for accessories and slots for writing utensils.
customer_reviews.author: EA Nupe

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Spacious
customer_reviews.text: Excellent man purse. I put all my gear in it each day before I hit the woods. Very sturdy, with excellent zippers and storage space.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: The Bag that Always Falls
customer_reviews.text: This bag is always falling - empty or full. It's always on the ground. It's always falling. I've never owned a bag that was so unbalanced for content.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, but the bottom is not leather!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice leather case except for the bottom which is NOT leather. It tends to wear out within a couple years. ( 2or 3 ) But my husband really likes the appearance and the leather. This is the second one we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Nice appearance but the design and features make the sale
customer_reviews.text: Six months in and no complaints. Great product. Dimensions and expandability are very useful. Organization pockets are a great help too.
customer_reviews.author: Common Consumer

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: It looks good but it is pretty big for carrying in your office daily. There are so many pockets but design is not very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably good
customer_reviews.text: It stands without falling. It looks good. On the flip side it does not have any pockets for chargers which are a must in these days of technology. They have done away with straps to secure the bag with larger bags while traveling. The zipped alternative is not neat and makes the bag lean significantly to the heavier side putting pressure on the bag joints. I worry they will give in soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rags

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought this briefcase for my husband to replace the one I bought him ten years ago (a Samsonite) he loved it. My husband likes a place for everything and everything in its place. He said this one was even better than the last one because it had more pockets and it looked just as nice as a very expensive briefcase that his co-worker just bought for about 3 times the amount I paid for this one. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Nice Professional Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Samsonite Leather Expandable briefcase for my husband, He really loves it, I like the fact that it expands, this will work for anyone that has lots of papers or other things to carry in their bag, it really looks professional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Lots of compartments to carry iPad or laptop notes etc
customer_reviews.author: Paul F.

customer_reviews.title: ... me as a Christmas present- and I am very happy with this purchase- REGARDLESS OF PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews before buying- actually my wife gave to me as a Christmas present- and I am very happy with this purchase- REGARDLESS OF PRICE. Has held up well, still looks new and I carry on sales calls about 3 days each week. I am NOT rough with it but it does get tossed in my trunk and carried on airplanes and has no noticeable marks. Pockets and dividers well placed and expands if needed. a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Larry A.

customer_reviews.title: Great  Laptop Briefcase
customer_reviews.text: My father LOVES this!! I got this for him for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Lil

customer_reviews.title: Not the best craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: For a samsonite I’d have to agree with other buyers that this bag falls apart quickly. 2 zippers are gone already after 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: will not hold multiple files easily
customer_reviews.text: It has too many compartments which interfere with it's capacity. I often travel with 10+ legal size files and end up having to stuff them in the multiple compartments. these multiple compartments are not displayed very clearly in the photographs, otherwise i would not have bought it. it is nice leather and seems to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: WMM

customer_reviews.title: Like this lunch bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought pink color, the real bag shows the same color as it shows online, and it has good looking! Spacious space, more than what i expect, it even has extra place for fruits and other stuff. It looks sturdy, well made by high quality material and has both detachable shoulder strap and handle to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy bag.
customer_reviews.text: Samsonite always provides a good product. Very happy with this purchase. However, as with everything else, it seems to be slightly smaller than the one I was replacing. Good buy and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strap broke after two years of moderate use
customer_reviews.text: This bag was okay while it lasted but the strap broke for no reason from normal usage after about two years (not daily; about twice a week). One day I was walking to work and the metal/plastic part of the strap just broke, and the bag dropped and got some cosmetic damage (scratches) as well.
customer_reviews.author: dkctaone

customer_reviews.title: Leather is good quality and the briefcase stands upright when placed on ...
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised. Lots of space for carrying presentations, laptop, planners, etc. Leather is good quality and the briefcase stands upright when placed on the ground (regardless of contents). The strap is a bit thin but still efficient. Would buy and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: RXL

customer_reviews.title: Love this briefcase
customer_reviews.text: Love this briefcase. Very well made and solid, having now used it for a couple of months. Though can't say as others if it's truly leather, but don't really care. Replaced this with my 12 years old, beloved one and am quite happy. Suspect I'll be using this daily for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: RobM

customer_reviews.title: very good quality and lots of pocket space
customer_reviews.text: This briefcase was a gift for my husbands birthday. He loves it!! very good quality and lots of pocket space. The price is excellent. I had researched other department stores for this case and ended up coming back to Amazon. This is actually my second time buying this case for hubby!! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyred

customer_reviews.title: It looks great and really
customer_reviews.text: This briefcase fits my 17.3 inch wide-screen HP laptop, a few books, folders, pens, wallet, phone, keys, and what not! It looks great and really, really fits a lot of stuff in it! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Sava

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size!
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a bag that can hold 2 of my laptops. A MacBook Pro and a 15.6" Windows laptop. This does just the job and still has more than enough room for documents, folders, pens, and all essentials you would need in briefcase bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good and is very spacious. However, being spacious, it is not one of those sleek models. Also, I haven't had it out in the rain and so I don't know if it'll leak inside. But given that it is a leather product, I'll try not to keep it out in the rain for very long anyway. have had it for too short a period of time to really be able to tell if the seams are good. It was a great buy for the discounted price.
customer_reviews.author: Aniruddha Mukhopadhyay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: very nice, a little lighter than my older one and the "leather" not as supple---for the cost its good
customer_reviews.author: mjhdds

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bag arrived as stated. I was a little weary after reading some of the reviews online, however it is perfect for an outside sales professional. I would recommend this to my friends and colleagues.
customer_reviews.author: David Dinsdale

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy what I paid for bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag start damaging due to site clip touching when I take the strap on shoulder less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Tabrez Rawoot

customer_reviews.title: Picture doesn't do it justice.
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than expected! This will be a Christmas present for my son. Lots of pockets and the case has an expandable gusset.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase!
customer_reviews.text: High quality bag! My husband is an attorney and uses it every day when he goes to and from work. He is very picky about this kind of stuff and is very happy with the briefcase. Looks nice, holds a lot! Has been using for the past few months and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & value.
customer_reviews.text: Professional looking, good organization of storage space, great value. Son is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda LeAnne

customer_reviews.title: Great feel.
customer_reviews.text: I've read that some reviewers feel this case is cheap or that it seems like fake leather, I disagree. The case is certainly a polished leather however I do not feel as though it feels cheap in any way. Its Samsonite and carries all the quality you'd expect from the brand. I love the amount of space it offers since I am able to fit my computer, books, iPad, and other items in it at the same time. Its definitely not for someone seeking a slim case, but for anyone seeking extra room, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: JEQ1

customer_reviews.title: Good standard briefcase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, as a birthday gift for my husband, to replace his old work briefcase. He's had it for 3 months now and really likes it. The product is as described and is good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: great, but:
customer_reviews.text: very nice bag. roomy, quality material and workmanship. but I had to return it. I originally thought I was buying it from amazon but it turned out to be from a third party. and they charged way more than amazon. so I returned it. but it is a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: stayone

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit bigger than I thought, but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Biddings

customer_reviews.title: Second One I have Bought!
customer_reviews.text: So, it is the second one I bought, which might scare you. But I am pretty rough on bags. I carry lots of heavy things, and I travel a lot. So, when a bag lasts a year and a half, I think that's a pretty good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: My first professional leather bag and I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first laptop/document bag for my new job and it has been a hit. Looks very stylish. Very strong and sturdy. Very very practical. I get everything in there that i need. I would recommend this to any and everyone looking for something very practical and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Imad Ali Syed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this briefcase! Well made and very convenient for my international trips
customer_reviews.author: Tom J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Briefcase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful Briefcase. The leather is nice. It is big enough for a laptop and files. I am sure it will make a good impression. My daughter will love it for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: skinnygirl140800

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband after his other briefcase finally fell apart. This bag is very high quality and has lots of pockets for storage of everything you could need. Very nice looking and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi J

customer_reviews.title: Great, economical, good-looking briefcase
customer_reviews.text: I travel every week, and bring this with me. It is well-organized, handy to expand when necessary, and looks great - I've received many compliments on it - in fact I've been surprised at how much people pay attention to that. People are also surprised at how affordable it was. The only downside for me is that the sleeve to put the handle of my roller bag through this is tight, especially when I have a newspaper in the outside pocket. I often-times just slip the handle of the briefcase of the roller-bag handle instead, which seems to work fine and is faster - but I do push it through the sleeve if I have a very long walk.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R. Tupper

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good, but the leather is too firm.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality briefcase, but the leather is too firm. I hasd similar one bought many years ago, and it was much softer and more comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Yuriy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and functional. Carrying a laptop and a tablet with associated gear.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Herbst

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and durable. I bought this as a gift for my uncle, and he loves it. It is spacious and can fit a 17 inch laptop.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.NAIR

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong on the price this Christmas season and this brand of leather bag has been used by my husband for years, It wears well, is roomy, holds his computer and all his materials, and is good looking...good buy, good bag!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Very good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this briefcase and use it daily back and for from college carrying my 17 Inch laptop and all other teaching stuff. Very very nice product and very fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Farik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great material, a little wider than expected, but works great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are superior quality briefcases available for the same price
customer_reviews.text: Adequate. There are superior quality briefcases available for the same price. I returned following my initial inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: excellent craftsmanship and very nice
customer_reviews.text: excellent craftsmanship and very nice!! I carry a lot of things around with me and this bag always stands upright.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great briefcase for anyone
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great briefcase for travel or for fashion. Looks great and it’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: BamaDaddy

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE & CAN'T BEAT THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because he needed a bigger computer bag. He loves this one! It's well made, very roomy, and attractive. The fact that it's leather and a fantastic price makes it that much better.
customer_reviews.author: elise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, yet holds a lot, with numerous compartments and pockets for organizing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey P. Lantos
